columns.name: enable_file_upload_notifications
columns.description: Indicates if file upload notifications are enabled for the iot hub.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: features
columns.description: The capabilities and features enabled for the iot hub. Possible values include: 'None', 'DeviceManagement'.

columns.name: min_tls_version
columns.description: Specifies the minimum TLS version to support for this iot hub.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether requests from public network are allowed.

columns.name: authorization_policies
columns.description: The shared access policies you can use to secure a connection to the iot hub.

columns.name: cloud_to_device
columns.description: CloudToDevice properties of the iot hub.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the iot hub.

columns.name: ip_filter_rules
columns.description: The IP filter rules of the iot hub.

columns.name: locations
columns.description: Primary and secondary location for iot hub.

columns.name: messaging_endpoints
columns.description: The messaging endpoint properties for the file upload notification queue.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: Private endpoint connections created on this iot hub.

columns.name: routing
columns.description: Routing properties of the iot hub.

columns.name: storage_endpoints
columns.description: The list of azure storage endpoints where you can upload files.
